sentences.en: Senator Bentsen has declined to get involved this time around.
sentences.cn: 这次本特森参议员又拒绝参与。

sentences.en: Senator Bill Bradley outlined his own tax cut, giving families $350 in tax credits per child.
sentences.cn: 比尔·布拉德利参议员概述了自己的减税计划，提出每个孩子可为家庭减免350美元的课税。

sentences.en: Senator Kerry carries considerable weight in Washington.
sentences.cn: 参议员克里在华盛顿举足轻重。

sentences.en: Senator Lugar is skeptical that Congress will appropriate more funding for this purpose.
sentences.cn: 参议员卢格怀疑国会是否会拨出更多资金用于此目的。

sentences.en: Senator Seymour has threatened a filibuster to block the bill.
sentences.cn: 参议员西摩威胁说要发表长篇演说来阻挠议案通过。

sentences.en: Senator Smith held forth a suggestion.
sentences.cn: 史密斯参议员提出了一项建议.

sentences.en: The senator ↗ brazened it out ↙ as the list of scandals grew.
sentences.cn: 丑闻不断出现,这位参议员依然若无其事.

sentences.en: The senator addressed the gathering informally.
sentences.cn: 那位参议员非正式地向与会者发表演说.

sentences.en: The senator claims to have been misquoted in the article.
sentences.cn: 参议员声称文章错误地引用了他的话。

sentences.en: The senator laid into the opponents of his bill.
sentences.cn: 那位参议员抨击反对他的提案的人.

sentences.en: The senator urged against the adoption of the measure.
sentences.cn: 那参议员极力反对采取这项措施.

sentences.en: The senator was forced to avow openly that he had received some money from that company.
sentences.cn: 那个参议员被迫承认曾经收过那家公司的一些钱.

sentences.en: The senator was indicted for murder.
sentences.cn: 那位参议员被控犯谋杀罪。

sentences.en: The voters bumped the senator and elected his rival.
sentences.cn: 选民们不选那位在职的参议员而选了他的对手.

sentences.en: Who is going to run against Senator Brown?
sentences.cn: 准备同布朗参议员竞选的是谁?

words.tran_cn: 参议院，上院；（古罗马的）元老院
参议员；（古罗马的）元老院议员；评议员，理事

trans.tran_en: a member of the Senate or a senate
